thread.title: Euro zone business boom eases off

title: Euro zone business boom eases off
text:
Euro zone business boom eases off 10:26am EDT - 01:38 
Euro zone businesses round off the first quarter of 2018 with their slowest growth in over a year, much weaker than expected. As Sonia Legg reports, surveys show new business has taken another hit from a stubbornly strong euro and nervousness about a potential trade war.
